name: Ninjaaaa !!
description:
Platformer with a ninja. 

You can dash by using "C",  jump with the spacebar and move with the arrows of 

your keyboard.  Three levels and a boss.

Have fun 

If your macbook can't open the game, just enter this : 

xattr -rc /Applications/"Made in GameMaker Studio 2.app"

in your terminal.
